author: Laura Mallonee
title: Stockholm's Subway Network is the World's Longest Art Walk
description: Photographer David Altrath engaged in his own form of social distancing to capture these photographs when commuters weren’t around.
content:
For tourists obsessed with beating the crowds, Covid-19 is a catch-22. With the worlds great attractions empty, itd be the perfect time to travel, but theyre only empty because a deadly new virus has forced everyone to stay home.
Thankfully, there are plenty… [+2966 chars]
